title: Day 122 (Psalm 133) - Year 3

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there. - Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST:

- Genesis 36:7

- Join Patreon to receive additional perks!

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
